description: Try our easy to follow Beef, Barley & Turnip Soup recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Soup,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Beef, Barley & Turnip Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Season beef with salt and pepper. Heat oil in large saucepan over medium-high heat and when hot, cook beef in batches until well browned. Remove meat using a slotted spoon and set aside.
Add onion, carrot, celery and garlic. Cook, stirring frequently, for about 5 minutes until golden. Add stock and 2 cups of water, stirring well to scrape juices from the base of the pan.
Return meat to pan with barley and bay leaves and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer, partly covered for 1 hour.
Add turnip and cook, uncovered for a further 30 minutes until tender, adding more water if too thick. Stir through parsley and ladle into bowls to serve.
